history.proof: intros. hauto lq: on use: is_rel_prime_div, Nat.mul_comm.

exceptions.tactic: intros k q p H1 H2.
intros k' q p H1 H2.
intros k' q' p H1 H2.
intros k' q' p' H1 H2.

exceptions.exn: In environment p, q, k : nat H : is_gcd p q 1 H0 : p div k * q The term "p" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "?p div ?q".

original: intros k q p H1 H2. apply (divides_mult_inv _ _ k) in H2. apply (is_gcd_div _ q) in H1. apply (divides_mult_r _ p). apply (divides_trans _ _ _ H1 H2).
